measure.CatchLine: Provides that local government that adopted and enforces wildfire hazard mitigation building code standards is not subject to any subsequent update to section R327 of Oregon Residential Specialty Code.
measure.MeasureSummary: Provides that local government that adopted and enforces wildfire hazard mitigation building code standards is not subject to any subsequent update to section R327 of Oregon Residential Specialty Code.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to local government authority on wildfire policy; amending ORS 455.612.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to local government authority on wildfire policy.
measure.AtTheRequestOf: (at the request of Senate Interim Committee on Natural Resources and Wildfire Recovery)
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
